summary: A PyTorch-based deep metric learning framework that implements the Smooth‑AP loss for training embedding models. It includes utilities for experiment logging and checkpointing, dataset classes with triplet sampling and augmentations, training and fine‑tuning pipelines, feature extraction, custom loss components (including binarized activations), and evaluation tools for retrieval metrics.
business_intent: Enable researchers and engineers to develop, train, and evaluate metric‑learning models with a differentiable approximation of average precision, providing a reproducible experimental environment and tools for analysis and deployment.
